attributes.action: Overrule the libdems if a large amount of people have signed a petition calling for action but which is being stopped by the lib dems.
attributes.additional_details: A few lib dem politicians kick up a fuss liked a spoilt child and the entire government has to stop because of them. Similary, If tens of thousands have voted on a petition a few MPs should not be able to stop the majority because of their position. Lib dems go on about how they believe in democracy but are not being democratic by stopping the will of the majority. If over a hundred thousand people vote on a petition it should get a fair hearing not be blocked by Mr Clegg.
